testcase.name: To validate by providing valid values for First Name, Last Name, Email, Phone Number input field in the Personal Details Form
testcase.system-out: Given OpenCart website is ready.............................................passed When I launch URL in chrome browser.........................................passed And I add some products to shopping cart....................................passed And I click on Checkout Button..............................................passed And I click on Continue as Guest Button.....................................passed And I enter valid First Name................................................passed And I enter valid Last Name.................................................passed And I enter valid Email.....................................................passed And I enter valid Phone Number..............................................passed And I enter valid Address1..................................................passed And I enter valid Address2..................................................passed And I enter valid City......................................................passed And I enter valid Post Code.................................................passed And I select valid Country..................................................passed And I select valid Zone.....................................................passed And I click on Continue Button in Personal Details Form.....................passed Then I should see Delivery Method Form......................................passed
